Content: A suspect has been arrested in connection with stealing a diamond and gems from a house at Erawwala area in Pannipitiya.The suspect has been arrested at the Mount Lavinia Maliban Junction by the officers of the Mirihana Special Crimes Operations Unit. Suspects have disguised as police officers, entered the house, assaulted the owner of the house and stolen gems and the diamond. A foreigner who had arrived to purchase the diamond was abducted. Police said the suspect is known as Thusitha Maduranga alias Matara Malli and he is a resident of Matara.
